feed.title: dep Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest dep news and events.

entry.title: Announcing dep v0.5.0
entry.summary:
v0.5.0 of dep has been [released](https://github.com/golang/dep/releases/tag/v0.5.0)!
The big theme of this release is performance improvements. dep was designed for safety from the outset, because we knew that foundation would let us speed things u

entry.title: Announcing dep v0.4.1 (with docs!)
entry.summary: v0.4.1 of dep has been released - and along with it, this site for documentation and announcements about dep! And, being that it's been nearly six months since [the last dep status update](https://sdboyer.io/dep-status/2017-08-17/) (which are now off
